explains: v. 增强；加强（intensify 的过去式与过去分词）

sentences.cn: 在夜间暴力活动加剧了。

sentences.en: The opposition leader has intensified his attacks on the government.
sentences.cn: 反对派领袖加强了对政府的攻击。

sentences.en: Conflict between employers and workers intensified and the number of strikes rose.
sentences.cn: 劳资矛盾加剧，罢工次数增多。
